description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTPolioIPVOnly for IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.IPV-only. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a poliovirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Inactivated polio vaccine (IPV)-only (in countries, in polio-free regions, with a very low risk of importation and sustained high routine immunization coverage (third dose of the diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis vaccine [DTP3] > 90%)
